blogPost.excerpt: Anonymously vouch for the best engineers among your LinkedIn connections and get $1500 for everyone who gets hired. You get assured $20 for just syncing your LinkedIn. Help your friends get connected to top Y-Combinator founders directly. No recruiters.
blogPost.body: Anonymously vouch for the best engineers among your LinkedIn connections and get $1500 for everyone who gets hired. You get assured $20 for just syncing your LinkedIn. Help your friends get connected to top Y-Combinator founders directly. No recruiters.
blogPost.title: Hiring Club - Recommend engineers to top startups and earn $1500 per hire
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 匿名为你的LinkedIn关系中最优秀的工程师打保票，每个被录用的人都能得到1500美元。只要同步你的LinkedIn，你就能保证获得20美元。帮助你的朋友直接与Y-Combinator的顶级创始人取得联系。没有招聘人员。
localize.tagline: 向顶级创业公司推荐工程师，每聘一次就能赚1500元。

localize.description: 匿名爲你的LinkedIn關係中最優秀的工程師打保票，每個被錄用的人都能得到1500美元。只要同步你的LinkedIn，你就能保證獲得20美元。幫助你的朋友直接與Y-Combinator的頂級創始人取得聯繫。沒有招聘人員。
localize.tagline: 向頂級創業公司推薦工程師，每聘一次就能賺1500元。

previous.excerpt: RapidReg - a scheduling and form building tool that includes all you need in one place, at a price you can't beat! Registrations, Form & survey builders, Availability calendars & online booking, Pricing and payments, and go green with planted trees!
previous.title: RapidReg LTD - Forms, bookings & scheduler with no limits that plants trees

localize.description: RapidReg - 一个日程安排和表格建立工具，包括所有你需要在一个地方，在一个价格你不能打！注册，表格和调查问卷建立，可用性日历和在线预订，定价和付款。注册，表格和调查建设者，可用性日历和在线预订，定价和付款，并去绿色种植的树木!
localize.tagline: 表格，预订和无限制的日程安排，植树。

localize.description: RapidReg - 一個日程安排和表格建立工具，包括所有你需要在一個地方，在一個價格你不能打！註冊，表格和調查問卷建立，可用性日曆和在線預訂，定價和付款。註冊，表格和調查建設者，可用性日曆和在線預訂，定價和付款，並去綠色種植的樹木!
localize.tagline: 表格，預訂和無限制的日程安排，植樹。
